entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -35.4°C
Wind: SSW 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
